Everett.Edward D. Hansen Conference Center: The Edward D. Hansen Conference Center is a $12 million addition to the Angel of the Winds Arena in Everett, Washington. This three-story facility includes a 11,385-square-foot (1,057.7 m2) ballroom with capacity for 800 guests and is divisible into four rooms.The Conference Center hosts approximately 200 events per year including banquets, trade shows, receptions, parties and others. In addition to the ballroom, three executive meeting rooms provide private meeting space for guests.
